headline: CEO Slite & Super (W18) | Most accurate search & workflows on team data
use_case_summary: CEO uses Claude Code to prototype quickly; packages and shares repeatable standards as Skills (e.g., brand guidelines, support responses, review standards) so teams get consistent output.
notes: Founder profile mentions YC W18 and $15M+ raised; good target for ‘deploy once + share across team + trigger from Slack/CRM’.

headline: Founder/CEO @ Writesonic | Helping brands win AI search (GEO) | Forbes30U30 | Microsoft Partner
location: San Francisco, California, United States of America
use_case_summary: Uses Claude Code to accelerate shipping (e.g., agentic content/video pipelines); natural webhook triggers: new content brief, new recording uploaded, traffic spike → run analysis + draft + schedule.
notes: Alternate Claude Code post with full text: https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:7419805572117590018

headline: CEO @ Recapped: Close 2x more deals. Helping leaders vibe code business solutions @ MasteringAI.
location: New York, New York, United States of America
use_case_summary: Uses Claude Code + browser automation to build CEO-grade GA4 dashboards and get plain-English coaching on what to watch; perfect for scheduled daily/weekly ‘CEO metrics brief’ and alerting.
notes: Strong non-dev pain: ‘I don’t know GA4’ → automate dashboards + explanations + weekly digest.

headline: Co-founder & CEO at Shovels
location: Walnut Creek, California, United States of America
use_case_summary: Uses Claude Code to automate custom research and workflows tied to CRM/RevOps (e.g., HubSpot research/updates); obvious webhook triggers: new lead, stage change, meeting ended, inbound form submission.
notes: Founder is building data-intelligence product; likely values ‘run in background + write-back to CRM + logs’.

headline: we are in an asymmetric war on slop
location: San Francisco, California, United States of America
use_case_summary: Founder building/using agent workflows; async execution + triggers matter for long-running agent tasks and multi-system automation.
notes: This may be closer to ‘adjacent/partner/competitor’ than a buyer; still useful as a reference persona + messaging test.

headline: Founder @ Growth Marketing Agency - Single Grain, Podcaster @ Marketing School + Leveling Up
location: Los Angeles, California, United States of America
use_case_summary: Describes using Claude Code to build a contextual decision layer (e.g., historical decisions from Gong + HubSpot closed-won) and generate client insights; obvious triggers: new Gong call, new HubSpot deal, weekly Slack summary.
notes: Excellent fit for webhook deployment: ‘scan calls weekly → produce top 3 opportunities/churn risks → post to Slack + email’.

headline: Helping leaders at mid-sized companies build great experiences with AI / Founder @ StealthX / Speaker / Podcast Host
location: Charlotte, North Carolina, United States of America
use_case_summary: Runs Claude Code for agency ops: transcript trend analysis + follow-ups, cashflow/P&L modeling, CEO dashboard (Slack/email/QB/Notion), contract redlining, proposal drafts, HubSpot updates, content idea extraction.
notes: Direct pain match: needs persistence + scheduling + triggers from systems (Gong/Zoom/HubSpot/QuickBooks/Notion).

headline: Making the AI transformation mountain climbable for ambitious SMBs | Strategic partner from base camp to market leadership | Guaranteed ROI
location: New York, New York, United States of America
use_case_summary: Claims Claude Code runs client work + CEO work via many agents + MCP integrations (Notion, Gmail/Calendar, GitHub); needs reliable async runs and external triggers to operationalize for clients.
notes: Great buyer for ‘deploy once → reuse across clients’ and ‘run without laptop open’ messaging.

headline: AI consultant for AI first company | I automate 80% of marketing & sales ops with AI systems | Founder, Threadsight
location: United States, United States of America
use_case_summary: Describes a 24/7 inbound conversion system: identify website visitors → generate personalized proposal → email in ~60 seconds; perfect for webhook triggers (web visit, form submit, pricing page view) and async execution.
notes: Also posts about trend monitoring and Slack digests; strong ‘non-dev agent’ operator persona.

headline: VP Innovation at Seer Interactive
location: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States of America
use_case_summary: Describes hearing a client-data oversight and quickly building a Claude Code prototype, then scaling it across all clients to push analyses from Snowflake to Slack.
notes: Ideal for ‘schedule + event triggers + team alerts’ and ‘share/deploy once across org’.

headline: Co-Founder/CTO @ C&C Strategic | RevOps @ Extendly | AI Automation & Business Operations Scaling for SMBs & Agencies
location: Texarkana, Texas, United States of America
use_case_summary: Uses Claude Code as a business operating system (hooks inject calendar/deadlines/state; slash commands orchestrate client projects); strong need for persistence and cross-tool triggering.
notes: Company page not available via LinkedIn tool from profile; treat as person-led services/ops role.
